next_steps.note: "Research and document 3 potential network scanning tools (e.g., Nmap, Masscan, Zenmap), focusing on their strengths, weaknesses, and suitability for this project.",
"Define the scope of network scanning: Specify target IP ranges or domains, and identify any legal or ethical constraints.",
"Create a basic network scanning script (e.g., using Python and a chosen tool's library) to ping a single target IP address and confirm connectivity.",
"Outline the desired output format for scan results.  What information needs to be collected and how should it be presented (e.g., CSV, JSON, database)?",
"Set up a test environment (virtual machine or isolated network) to safely perform initial scans without impacting production systems."

"Define scope of network scanning: Specify target network ranges, permitted scan types (e.g., ping sweep, port scan, OS detection), and any exclusion rules to prevent disruption or unauthorized access.",
"Select and configure network scanning tool: Choose a suitable tool (e.g., Nmap, Masscan, Zenmap) and install/configure it with appropriate credentials and initial scan parameters.",
"Develop a basic scan script/command:  Create a simple script or command-line instruction to perform a ping sweep of the defined target network to verify basic connectivity and identify live hosts.",
"Document scanning plan & reporting format: Create a document outlining the planned scans (type, target, frequency), and define the format for reporting scan results (e.g., CSV, JSON, text report).",
"Address 9 pending next steps: Review the existing list of 9 pending next steps and prioritize/delegate/estimate completion time for at least 3 of them to ensure forward momentum."
"Investigate and resolve the 'run_manager' error preventing idea streaming; examine logs for root cause.",
"Prioritize the 15 pending next steps based on impact and feasibility; create a ranked list.",
"Begin implementation of the top 3 prioritized next steps, focusing on the most critical functionality.",
"Design a basic network scanning test case to validate initial functionality after implementing the first 3 steps.",
"Document the current network scanning architecture and any assumptions made about the target environment."
